name: Funny Bubble Rescue Pet
description:
Funny Bubble Rescue Pet is a great new bubbles shooter game with 900 amazing levels, like the classic bubble shooter and arcade bubble shooter version every one loves.Enjoy this fun and relaxing game and rescue the adorable animals from their bubble trap! Be sure you plan your shots and win levels. There are hundreds of amazing levels to enjoy, packed with awesome power-ups, puzzles and bonuses.
Enjoy the Game
* Drag your finger to move the laser aiming, and lift it to pop bubbles.
* You need to match at least 3 bubbles of the same color to pop the group and clear the screen.
* Save the adorable animals from the bubble jail!
* Hundreds of entertaining levels to explore, download and play today!
* Exciting boosters and power-ups that will help you complete levels
* Play anytime and anywhere, you can also play offline.
